component.name: Serial Studio
component.summary: The universal dashboard for embedded systems

description.p: Serial Studio is an open source, cross-platform telemetry dashboard and real-time data visualization tool. It supports data input from serial ports, Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), MQTT, and TCP/UDP sockets—ideal for embedded devices, external tools, or network services.
It runs on Windows, macOS, and Linux, and is built for telemetry monitoring, sensor analysis, and real-time debugging in educational, hobbyist, and professional environments.

ul.li: Project File Mode (recommended): Define dashboard layout and data mapping using local JSON files created with the integrated Project Editor.
Quick Plot Mode: Instantly visualize comma-separated values—no config required.
Device-defined Mode: Dashboards are dynamically created from incoming JSON data.
Cross-platform: Native support for Windows, macOS, and Linux.
CSV export: Save incoming data for offline analysis or post-processing.
Multiple inputs: Connect via serial, BLE, MQTT, or TCP/UDP sockets.
Custom dashboards: Design interfaces with visual widgets using the Project Editor.
Advanced decoding: Use JavaScript to handle raw or binary data streams.
MQTT integration: Send/receive data over the internet for remote access and visualization.
